question: This company launched the business application to enable small and medium businesses to accept digital payments.
explanation: Digital payments platform Paytm has unveiled an application called 'Paytm for Business' to enable small and medium businesses to accept digital payments.The application, available on Android Play Store, would enable merchants to sign up quickly and get a Paytm QR code to start accepting digital payments, the company said.The application, available in 10 regional languages, would allow merchants to track payments, navigate past collections and trace settlements made to their bank accounts.
